replies.body: Please Riot I know it's a a bit early but we need another latinamerican skin <3 {{champion:136}} this gauy looks so much like Quetzalcoatl, the mayan winged snake God.
lol good luck on that. if they did that they would get sued in no time
Sued for what, exactly? Last I checked, ancient mythology isn't copyrighted.

Bless whoever made that decision.
{{champion:103}} {{champion:268}}   {{champion:69}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:62}}
Kitsunes. Anyone but me know.  Or am I just too obsessed with Japan? {{champion:103}}
Ahri isn't a kitsune, and she's based on Korean folklore, not Japanese.
Completely correct. Nobody can sue due this. Chinese people already have done this years ago because of Wu Kong if that could be true. So not even close Nick Dreamer.
If they could SMITE wouldnt exist..as it is ALL mythology based champions :|

Probably not, quetzalcoatl is public domain, but they probably still won't do it because it's too similar to something smite would do, and league likes to be super unique because that's their main pull.
Lol....Not even sure how to reply to this one...Really?
Ikr. Wait, is there a game standing behind me that didn't steal all of its ideas from the last 40 years of pop culture? There's literally a skin that's Oscar the Grouch riding Grover...

@Shark Music
Looks more like Cookie Monster to me :D

Well Steely Soul is great from Riot to be original , but remember that it added Wu Kong that is the Chinese Monkey god , which we know so much in Japanese as the famous Goku from Dragonball. So I need to say that Quetzalcoatl skin could be indeed a great idea regarding what I just explain. Great is that Riot takes elements from every human culture and myths as well to do its LOL Champions. Cheers
I think he looks a bit like a blue Rayquaza. That would be a good skin.
Now that, WOULD, be copyright striked
Age of Empires brought me here{{summoner:3}} <3
How?

I think this is a great idea. I´m from Costa Rica which has the farthest location of Mesoamerican influence (Aztec, Mexica, Mayan, amongst others...) in Central America which came from the North (no other country from Costa Rica to the south has this), and Quetzalcoatl appears frequently on pottery from the ancient inhabitants of our country which received this influence. I support this.
you mean a skin to look like kukulkan from smite?
Same thing. Smite's Kukulkan is clearly inspired by the feathered serpent, and Kukulkan and Quetzalcoatl are extremely similar Aztec/Mayan deities.
Definitly Not Ao Shin{{champion:136}}
You genius baztard, i approve.
Dear riot, one day do us all a favor an make a spyro skin for {{champion:136}} or mabye even {{champion:102}} Then life will be great again!
yes yes SKYLANDERS YAY
Spyro was before skylanders :P
Waaaay before.
gotta love the good ol' ps1
The hell are Skylanders?  Are they like grublins?
Its the thing that killed Spyro

Skylanders is a game that made waaaaaay more money than it deserved
Not only was it generally a crappy game series but you had to go to the store and buy each playable character individually for at least $15 per character
So yeah basically the game made tons of money because all the stupid kids who don't know how money works were constantly getting their parents to buy them these things
It's basically nothing more than a cheap cash grab
Look's Like someone has never played a Spyro game. *sigh* he needs a reboot. a SOLO reboot.

Emmy wished on a dragon scale
And that's what started Dragon Tales
Around the room the dragons flew
But Emmy and Max knew what to do
They climbed on the backs of their dragon friends
Now the adventures never end!
Watched an episode of that on Netflix the other day. I don't know why I absolutely loved it as a kid.

im literally in tears right now because my ashen lord was placed among all these amazing works of art. My mom really doesn't give two poops about my art, and when my friends all said "CHECK OUT THE COMMUNITY SPOT LIGHT YOU NERD" i realized, its okay, BECAUSE RITO CARES !!!!
It's an awesome piece! Thank you for sharing it with the community. ^_^
The style you presented {{champion:136}}  in reminds me of the game Okami, which I dearly love. Keep up the amazing work

> [{quoted}](name=Dragonmedik,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=GOrpl1eM,comment-id=00280002,timestamp=2016-04-01T11:00:11.535+0000)
>
> The style you presented {{champion:136}}  in reminds me of the game Okami, which I dearly love. Keep up the amazing work

thank you! i didn't really notice until you pointed it out, i've always drawn in this style when it came to coloring and just overall look, its good to know people can draw their own conclusions on my style. it's more refreshing than a cooldown ! ~~I'm Sorry Phreak Senpai~~
I'm in the same boat. People in real life, especially my parents, don't give a crap on my art as well. But hey, we get to see each others works here too. :p

{{champion:136}} "Star Forger" {{champion:16}} "Star Child" 
You trying to tell us something here Riot? {{champion:432}}

I feel like there should be a sitcom called "The Cosmics" where {{champion:136}}, {{champion:432}} and {{champion:16}} live in a house together like a family
{{champion:432}} is the fatherly figure and always gives his family advice about life
{{champion:136}} is a teen boy-like figure who thinks he's the best at everything
{{champion:16}} is the stereotypical teen girl who's always on her phone and stuff
And idk maybe {{champion:203}} could be their next door neighbors
~~lions and tigers and bears oh my~~ Dragons and dragons and more dragons, oh my.
Dragons, Slayers, and Trainers, oh my!
that champ looks like a giant salamander, dont know y people compare it with chinese dragon
To be honest, salamanders sort of look like Chinese dragons.

most people have the idea of a Western dragon stuck in their heads, due to a few decades of pop-culture and movies

Eastern dragons have a longer history and are more lizard like. longer bodies and shorter limbs. if you dont get a comparison/reference, you can always google it
"Tacky, but acceptable for mortals."
If {{champion:136}} is the "Star Forger" and {{champion:16}} is the "Star Child" does that mean she is Mr. Sol's kid? further more would that make{{champion:432}} his butler?
Where is stargaurdian aurelion?

Pretty bummed I didn't make this. Worked so hard on this drawing and it took me forever, would've been my first time in a feature and for a champion I've been so hyped for. Not really sure what I expected because nobody cares about traditional art anyways. Guess I'll just post mine here and add my 2 cents.

Not even a single piece of traditional artwork, and I know I wasn't the only one who draws. Kinda sad and discouraging to all traditional fan artists..

https://40.media.tumblr.com/9ebcd7d95ff4da32faa313f4d9ea38fc/tumblr_o4d85fxZOz1us9822o1_1280.jpg

Heres the boards page if anyone actually cares to visit it
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/UeibwEU9-remember-your-roots

Hi Charyzard,

Thank you for sharing your art! I'm very sorry that we missed your piece. I love the idea of showing two sides of Aurelion Sol, and really appreciate how crisp your line work is. 

In no way do we want to discourage traditional artists (this is my preferred medium as well). Though because digital art is quite prevalent, it can sometimes be challenging to find a balance for the gallery. There's just so much amazing art out there! We try to include a mix of new creators and styles whenever possible, but I will endeavor to increase the frequency.

Awesome! I'm a fan of BlondynkiTezGraja's work as well, and was happy to include her Jhin art and some other traditional pieces in the last community post. Check them out here: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/EbZwkQb9-jhin-community-creations 

Thank you for your feedback, and keep creating awesome art!
